data.title: Romance Package
data.meta_description: Celebrate love with Princess Cruises' Romance Packages. Perfect for anniversaries, honeymoons, or special moments at sea.
data.meta_site_name: Cruises – Cruise Vacations – Find Best Cruises
data.text:
If you’re feeling the love, we’ve got options for you. Say your vows (at sea, harborside or ashore!), renew your vows, pop a proposal – there’s a package for that.

Look back on your years together over a dinner for two in one of our specialty restaurants, and keep the celebration going with a few festive indulgences, a photo to remember it all and more. Upgrade for a couple’s massage in the Lotus Spa®. Save 10% compared to buying the same offerings individually.

Packages range from $199–$449.

How do you celebrate saying “I do”? With vintage Champagne, a gourmet breakfast on the balcony and quality time together soaking in the dry heat, steam and aromatherapy mist of our therapeutic thermal suite. Upgrade this package and also receive a couple’s massage in the Lotus Spa®. Package purchase saves you 10%.

Packages range from $299–$549.
